title: U.K. Betting Firm Flutter Strikes Merger With Canada’s Stars
text:
Flutter Entertainment PLC agreed to merge with Canada’s Stars Group Inc., a move that would create an online gambling giant worth more than $11 billion when internet and app-based betting is taking hold in new global markets, including the U.S.

Flutter, based in Dublin and listed in London, owns bookie brands in the U.K. including Paddy Power and Betfair, which operate walk-in betting parlors in shopping districts of many of Britain’s cities and towns. They offer bets on everything from horse racing and boxing to the fate...
